CAMP Fund

For qualified investors, there is a rare opportunity to go on the offensive in what has begun as a highly defensive investment year. Campaign Advanced Media Purchase Fund, LLC (CAMP) is offering a unique investment vehicle that enables investors to access the projected $3.4 billion market for local television political advertising time during this election year.1

Read more

Operating on the basis of historically verifiable price increases, CAMP will deploy investor capital early in the election season to purchase non-candidate advertising time (called ‘issue’ time) scheduled to air in late October in key U.S. presidential and senatorial media markets. CAMP will resell the time later in the election cycle at substantial mark-ups but discounted below market rates at the time of sale. CAMP will target Super PACs and other large buyers of issue time for resale of its media inventory.

Investment Details

Industry:Marketing and Advertising
Target Raise Amount:$20,000,000
Minimum Raise Amount:$1,000,000
Minimum Investment Amount:$100,000
Class A Return:100% of distributable cash until 8% hurdle; 80% of distributable cash until 15% hurdle; 20% of distributable cash thereafter, uncapped
Holding Period:Under one year. Company will dissolve and distribute in December 2016.
Projected Return:$19,279 per $100,000 unit under moderately performing scenario at full capitalization; $17,777 at minimum capitalization
Securities Offered:Up to 200 Class A Units

1On Points: Our 2016 TV Ad Spending Projection, Elizabeth Wilner, 7/20/15; http://cookpolitical.com/story/8685
